import React, { Component } from "react"; var https = require("https"); class Calculator extends React.Component { state = { apiKey: "4b2ea96ceadc94e3995c", currency: "cad", currencies: { CAD: "CAD", USD: "USD", NGN: "NGN", EUR: "EUR", INR: "INR", GBP: "GBP", AUD: "AUD", ZAR: "ZAR", AED: "AED", CNY: "CNY" }, values: [ 2000.0, 4000.0, 506.0, 5000.0, 400.0, 200.0, 5000.0, 60000.0, 24000.0, 455000.0, 1564321.0, 4342.0, 322.0, 250999.0, 632634.0, 10000.0, 10000.0 ] }; convertCurrency = (fromCurrency, toCurrency, cb) => { console.log(this.state); fromCurrency = encodeURIComponent(fromCurrency); toCurrency = encodeURIComponent(toCurrency); var query = fromCurrency + "_" + toCurrency; var val = 0; var url = "https://free.currconv.com/api/v7/convert?q=" + query + "&compact=ultra&apiKey=" + this.state.apiKey; fetch(url) .then(res => res.json()) .then(result => { console.log(result); val = result; console.log(this.state); }); console.log(val); https.get(url, function(res) { var body = ""; res.on("data", function(chunk) { body += chunk; }); res.on("end", function() { try { var jsonObj = JSON.parse(body); val = jsonObj[query]; cb(null, val); // if (val) { // } else { // var err = new Error("Value not found for " + query); // console.log(err); // } } catch (e) { console.log("Parse error: ", e); } }); }); }; getCurrency = e => { var rate = 0; this.setState({ currency: e.target.value }); this.convertCurrency("USD", "CAD", function(err, amount) { console.log(amount); rate = amount; console.log(this); console.log(rate); }); console.log(rate); }; render() { return (
